attributes.action: Ban the practice of non stunned Halal and Kosher meat in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: It is a cruel method of slaughter to appease a pointless religious doctrine. Animal welfare comes above appeasing religion in a civilised country.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of non stunned Halal and Kosher meat in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593416
